Boys are held to higher expectations in school, not allowed to cry, expected to be tough and never need help, and will face punishment by both peers and authority figures if they fail. Even when they get to the point of being suicidal, parents will most likely try to punish it out of them. Boys are expected to go to work and provide for themselves and likely a family, and deal with their problems at their own expense. Boys are also required to sign up for the draft. Meanwhile girls are shown support no matter how whiny they are, and are not expected to deal with as much stress or accomplish as much. They are allowed to make mistakes. Since very few will work at something if they don't have to, this results in girls being absorbed in meaningless gossip and makeup shows. Basically, men still have to do everything for women, even when the women can do it far better than they can. Men have to do far more to survive. If the sexes were subject to equal treatment you'd see just how far behind males are in 90% of the mental realm. The fact that females still maintain the same average intelligence as males in this situation is itself remarkable.

I think you're just locked in your mindset of "men are always superior at everything no exceptions" the same way the media refuses to acknowledge that there are fundamental biological differences between the sexes, and men are designed for all the non-enjoyable dirtywork most of which isn't even relevant in the modern world. I'm male, do you really think I *want* this to be the case? It just is what it is.

body: No, it's been proven that natural talent accounts for at least 75% of ability. And don't lie to me, being "talented" at anything outside of sports is seen as a feminine trait and always has been, everyone knows that. It's not without reason. Male simply is not supposed to have a rich, sophisticated inner world. We're designed to be warriors, workers, and sperm donors. That doesn't require much thought or even a "personal life" hardly at all. And yes it's natural talent, because it's due to observed brain differences; male and female brains are wired and built fundamentally differently, male for physio-spatial functions and female more well rounded and geared toward logic and creativity. Unfortunately for males, the second function is both the enjoyable one and the one that's not obsolete in modern life. Even worse, we get a mild taste of what we lost as before puberty the process of sacrificing everything to specialize in physio-spatial is not yet complete.
